mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FavoriteList ( USERNUMBER, SGGCD, UMDNM, APTNM, JIBUN, EXCLUUSEAR, DEALYEAR, DEALMONTH, DEALDAY, DEALAMOUNT, FLOOR, BUILDYEAR, CDEALTYPE, CDEALDAY, DEALINGGBN, ESTATEAGENTSGGNM, RGSTDATE, APTDONG, SLERGBN, BUYERGBN, LANDLEASEHOLDGBN, APTSEQ, BONBUN, BUBUN, LANDCD, ROADNM, ROADNMBONBUN, ROADNMBUBUN, ROADNMCD, ROADNMSEQ, ROADNMSGGCD, ROADNMBCD, UMDCD, LAT, LNG, SUBWAYSTATION, SUBWAYDISTANCE ) VALUES ( #{usernumber}, #{sggcd}, #{umdnm}, #{aptnm}, #{jibun}, #{excluusear}, #{dealyear}, #{dealmonth}, #{dealday}, #{dealamount}, #{floor}, #{buildyear}, #{cdealtype}, #{cdealday}, #{dealinggbn}, #{estateagentsggnm}, #{rgstdate}, #{aptdong}, #{slergbn}, #{buyergbn}, #{landleaseholdgbn}, #{aptseq}, #{bonbun}, #{bubun}, #{landcd}, #{roadnm}, #{roadnmbonbun}, #{roadnmbubun}, #{roadnmcd}, #{roadnmseq}, #{roadnmsggcd}, #{roadnmbcd}, #{umdcd}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{subwaystation}, #{subwaydistance} )
